abilities.desc: After each space you move using Free Movement, you may Move 1 to one ally or obstacle within range. Obstacles you move with this Ability become Rubble.
abilities.trigger: after each space you move using free movement

abilities.desc: At the end of your turn, each enemy that moved this turn takes 1 damage, and each ally that moved this turn heals 2.
abilities.trigger: at the end of your turn

actions.name: Pull The Strings
actions.desc:
Target an enemy or ally you can see. Pull them 3.
4+: Target an enemy or ally within range. Push them 3.
7+: Target an enemy or ally within range. Choose one: Push them up to 4; -or- Pull them up to 4.
